mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, NAME, NAME_FONT_COLOR, NAME_FONT_SIZE, TITLE, TITLE_FONT_COLOR, TITLE_FONT_SIZE, CONTENT, CONTENT_FONT_COLOR, CONTENT_FONT_SIZE, PROFILE_BOX_COLOR, PROFILE_BOX_OPACITY, PROFILE_BOX_POSITION, BG_IMG_URL, BG_IMG_LAYOUT FROM USER_PROFILE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_PROFILE ( USER_ID, NAME, NAME_FONT_COLOR, NAME_FONT_SIZE, TITLE, TITLE_FONT_COLOR, TITLE_FONT_SIZE, CONTENT, CONTENT_FONT_COLOR, CONTENT_FONT_SIZE, PROFILE_BOX_COLOR, PROFILE_BOX_OPACITY, PROFILE_BOX_POSITION, BG_IMG_URL, BG_IMG_LAYOUT ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{name}, #{nameFontColor}, #{nameFontSize}, #{title}, #{titleFontColor}, #{titleFontSize}, #{content}, #{contentFontColor}, #{contentFontSize}, #{profileBoxColor}, #{profileBoxOpacity}, #{profileBoxPosition}, #{bgImgUrl}, #{bgImgLayout} )
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_PROFILE SET NAME = #{name}, NAME_FONT_COLOR = #{nameFontColor}, NAME_FONT_SIZE = #{nameFontSize}, TITLE = #{title}, TITLE_FONT_COLOR = #{titleFontColor}, TITLE_FONT_SIZE = #{titleFontSize}, CONTENT = #{content}, CONTENT_FONT_COLOR = #{contentFontColor}, CONTENT_FONT_SIZE = #{contentFontSize}, PROFILE_BOX_COLOR = #{profileBoxColor}, PROFILE_BOX_OPACITY = #{profileBoxOpacity}, PROFILE_BOX_POSITION = #{profileBoxPosition}, BG_IMG_URL = #{bgImgUrl}, BG_IMG_LAYOUT = #{bgImgLayout} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
